question_text:
Question 42 
 
Which one of the following represents the CORRECT effects of concentration polarization in a reverse osmosis 
process? 
 
 
 
 
[Mass Transfer, 2 Marks]
 
 
(A) 
Reduced water flux and reduced solute rejection  
 
(B) 
Increased water flux and increased solute rejection  
 
(C) 
Reduced water flux and increased solute rejection  
 
(D) 
Increased water flux and reduced solute rejection  
Ans. 
(A)
explanation_text:
Sol. 
Reduced water flux and reduced solute rejection is the correct effect of concentration polarization in a 
reverse osmosis process.
